Utils
=====

Introduction
------------

``Utils`` is a set of C++ classes collected for simplify
my software developing.

- `Github repository <https://github.com/ebertolazzi/Utils>`__
- `Online doc <https://ebertolazzi.github.io/Utils>`__

3rd party software included
---------------------------

- `{fmt} <https://fmt.dev/latest/index.html>`__
- `rang <https://github.com/agauniyal/rang>`__
- `zstr <https://github.com/mateidavid/zstr>`__.
- `Eigen <https://eigen.tuxfamily.org>`__.
